alert.note: Alert for Barry; Eaton; Ingham; Kalamazoo; Van Buren (Michigan) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Winter Weather Advisory issued February 17 at 7:18PM EST until February 18 at 1:00AM EST by NWS Grand Rapids
info.description: ...WINTER WEATHER ADVISORY REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 1 AM EST FRIDAY... * WHAT...Snow. Additional snow accumulations of 2 to 4 inches. * WHERE...Barry, Eaton, Kalamazoo, Van Buren and Ingham counties. * WHEN...Until 1 AM EST Friday. * IMPACTS...Plan on slippery road conditions. The hazardous conditions will impact the evening commute. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS...Snow, occasionally heavy, is being reported across the Winter Weather Advisor area at 7 pm this evening. Radar and satellite loops suggest the snow will continue heavy at time until around midnight. Expect snowfall rates as high of between 1/2 and 1 inch per hour until around midnight. The combination of temperatures falling into the lower to mid 20s and north winds gusting to near 30 mph at times, will result in some blowing and drifting of the snow, making travel conditions even more hazardous.
info.instruction: Slow down and use caution while traveling.

area.areaDesc: Barry; Eaton; Ingham; Kalamazoo; Van Buren
